rules
*****


Description
===========

A security rule is one of the items in a NetworkSecurityGroup. It is a
virtual firewall rule for the VNICs in the network security group. A
rule can be for either inbound (>>`<<direction`= INGRESS) or outbound
(>>`<<direction`= EGRESS) IP packets.


Available Commands
==================

* add

* list

* remove

* update
